profile_positions.description:
Gather business requirements and translate them into user stories/functional specifications.
Analyse, define, and document complex requirements and business processes.
Develop complex systems specifications, process flow, and conversion strategies.
Operate in a hybrid agile style environment and participate in on-going improvement of the SDLC.
Contribute to the development of new tools, processes, and solutions to meet desired product needs.
Follow established business processes, protocols, and quality standards in the development and deployment of complex solutions.
Perform analysis on existing systems; identifying options for potential solutions and assess for both technical and business suitability. 


Consultancy
Maintain stakeholder expectations and raise appropriate issues to management as necessary.
Develop “trusted advisor” relationship with senior stakeholders through effective communication and efficient, quality execution on projects.
Attend regular user forums to ensure that the product continues to deliver business benefits, and gather product enhancements that drive continuous improvement.
Support business users to ensure smooth transition from development activities into production by providing product knowledge during training, UAT and go live activities.
Share expertise and experience with less experienced team members
Identify and document process improvements and functional specifications based on research of best practices and analysis of work group data.
Complete research activities and advise product management and business users on new innovations and technologies within the industry.
Work between remote development teams, internal IT, and business to ensure requirements are being met.

profile_positions.title: Crm Support

profile_positions.description:
As an E-Sales Support Coordinator you are a member of the E-Sales Support Team, working within a multi-functional Regional Team organizing, preparing and archiving the administrative workflow of the Sales Process. For that reason the E-Sales Support Coordinator works in very close cooperation with Account Managers and supports him/her in organizing the sales process in the most efficient and effective way. 

 

Duties 


Be the key support for the Account Manager in the Sales Process 
First line contact for customer issues 
Central point of contact for customer towards internal partners 
Responsible for contract execution 
Preparation of holding reports (history, attrition analysis, print spend analysis) 
Owner of holding reconciliation (responsible for data, accuracy and account reconciliation) 
Gather and analyse usage reports and other pre-sales call analysis 
Provide and organize follow up and after care to account management customers 
Reporting to E-Sales Support Manager 

HBO+ levelLeadership/follow through, ability to prioritise 
Good analytical and conceptual skills 
Sound knowledge of IT systems (Siebel, CRM) 
Excellent knowledge of Excel 
Flexible, capable to work under high pressure 
Well structured and accurate, be able to administrate and monitor entire sales process 
Supportive for account management 
Proactive and self starting 

DDP Coordinator
Responsibilities: 
Answer all local enquiries re DDP 
Ensure hierarchy is updated before flagging 
Obtain approval for any non standard deals 
Alert sales organization to DDP updates 
Train sales organization on DDP rules 
Alert Global Sales Ops DDP Coordinator to any issues 
Provide Global Sales Ops DDP Coordinator with list of customers going e only on a monthly basis 
Alert Local Fulfilment DDP Coordinator of any issues/questions 
 
Knowledge & Skills Required: 
Expert on DDP functionality within CRM 
Good understanding of business rules for DDP 
Pro active approach
profile_positions.title: E sales support coordinator: Subsahara, Middle East, Turkey, Israel/ DDP Coordinator

Account Opening, Maintenance and administration
Targeted telephone call logs where expected to generate appointments for branch network
Call return log which involves returning calls and either solving the customers issue or elevating to appropriate person.
